title: Beauty\ Health Corner
seo_description: There is no better time than now to start living healthy. When health is absent, wisdom cannot reveal itself, art cannot manifest, strength cannot fight, wealth becomes useless, and intelligence cannot be applied.
description:
<!--StartFragment-->

Our greatest happiness does not depend on the condition of life in which chance has placed us, but is always the result of a good conscience, good health, occupation, and freedom in all just pursuits.

<!--EndFragment-->
